title: WAI-ARIA Tab Element
introduce: Below Content is Tabs that applied WAI-ARIA for Assistive Technologies.
paragraph_google: Google is a name of search engine, service, and company. Google is my favorite search engine!
paragraph_apple: Apple is a name of delicious fruit! And Also it's a name of company that famous for iPhone!
paragraph_microsoft: Microsoft! I think cool company that make a stable operating system! I was liked innovational things. So, I&aps;ve been crazy them, and I still like them. But, I think compnay that make the most-stable OS is a Microsoft.
